column3: Rebased to make it more readable.\n

I am very sorry for delaying this again, but I'm closing until it's clear how the first step for policy should be. Something I invite reviewers to discuss at #5595 where I've placed some examples. \n
Reopened. I was waiting for ~~#5595~~ #6068, but no real reason to keep waiting.\nI'm also moving CFeeRate out of consensus to policy/fees (previously was necessary for primitives/transaction).\n
Needs rebase and I'm thinking about moving the functions to the fee estimator (policy/fees) instead of policy/policy, so closing for now.\n
